defs: a kind of plant.
= ನಾರಲೆ.
= ನಾರಾಚ.
= ನಾರಸಿಂಹ2.
relating to the fourth of the ten major incarnations of Viṣṇu.
the fourth of the ten major incarnations of Viṣṇu, in which he assumed a formidable form with lioṇs head and human body.
one of the eighteen Hindu Purāṇas which deals with the legend of the fourth incarnation of Viṣṇu, in the form of half-lion and half-man.
the grass Saccharum spontaneum of Poaceae family the reed of which is used for making thatches; thatch grass.
the grass Saccharum fuscum of Poaceae family.
its reed, used for writing with; a reed-pen.
a marshy land abounding in these reeds.
a kind of arrow having iron shaft with five long feathers at one end.
an arrow, in gen.
a long shaft with a pointed metal end used as weapon; a spear.
a metal style with a pointed end for writing on usu. palm leaves.
a kind of medicinal substance.
an assay-balance used by goldsmiths; a goldsmith's scale.
(mus.) the sound of a percussion instrument that does not have melody, but produced by beatings for time-keeping.
the primordial Power of the universe.
Viṣṇu, one of the Hindu Trinities, conceived as the embodiment of properties as mercifulness, goodness, etc. and the preserver of the universe.
Křṣṇa, the eighth incarnation of Viṣnu.
a mystical hymn considered as a preservative like armour.
= ನಾರಾಯಣಗೌಳ.
a musical mode, derived from the main mode Harikāmbhoji, in Karnāṭaka system.
a kind of liquid medicinal substance used as a pain-killing balm.
a musical mode, derived from the main mode Naṭhabhairavi, in Karnāṭaka system.
another mode in the same system, derived from the main mode Dhīra Śankarābharaṇa.
a religious offering made to a deity or manes at the obsequies of person died unnaturally or of the one who remained a bachelor during his life.
= ನಾರಾಯಣ- 6.
Nārāyaṇa, in the form of a woman, Mōhini.
Lakṣmi, the consort of Nārāyaṇa.
the essential Power of the universe, conceived in the form of Durgā.
the climbing asparagus Asparagus racemosus of Liliaceae family, having fleshy roots and fine fern-like leaves.
a musical mode, derived from the main mode Dhīra Śankarābharaṇa.
= ನಾರಾಯಣ - 5.
the string of a bow.
the fibrous web at the bottom of a coconut leaf-stalk.
an adult human being; a woman.
ಒಲಿದರೆ ನಾರಿ, ಮುನಿದರೆ ಮಾರಿ olidare nāri, munidare māri she who bestows favour when friendly, can annihilate when enraged.
he who is foe-less; a man having no enemy.
the plant Cleome gynandra (= Gynandropsis pentaphylla) of Capparaceae family.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
the coconut palm, Cocos nucifera of Arecaceae family.
its nut consisting of a thick, fibrous, brown, oval husk, a thin, hard shell, an edible white layer of meat, filled with a sweet, milky fluid; coconut.
a style, as in writing, music, etc., that demands serious and deep pondering over.
a kind of medicinal substance made using the coconut-milk.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.

= ನಾರಿಕೇಳ.
to emit a pleasant scent or odour.
to give off unpleasant smell; to stink.
to prolong or remain unfinished (as an unpleasant work).
smell, either pleasant or unpleasant.
a slender, threadlike structure that combines with others to form vegetable tissue; a fibre.
a slender, threadlike structure made from a mineral or synthetically.
the hard, separable covering of the hard wood of a tree; bark.
the fibrous part of fruits (as of mango).
the husks of coconuts; coir.
the worm Dracunculus medinensis, that is parasitic in the subcutaneous tissues of people and other mammals; guinea worm.
the tree Crataeva marmelos (= Aegle marmelos) of Capparaceae family.
the plant Gymnostachyum febrifugum of Acanthaceae family.
the plant Curcuma caesia of Zingiberaceae (ginger) family.
a man who is dealing in fibres, coir, etc.
to pull out the coir, fibre from a coconut, other fruits etc.
a woman who is dealing in fibres, coir, etc.
= ನಾರುಬಟ್ಟೆ.
a rough covering, made from the barks of a tree, used as cloth by ascetics.
the large-sized, deciduous tree Acrocarpus fraxinifolius of Caesalpinae family with bipinnate leaves, the wood of which is used for railway-sleepers, shingles, etc.
the plant Acorus calamus of Araceae family; sweet-flag root.
the nettle plant Gironniera cuspidata (= G. reticulata) of Ulmaceae family; worm seed plant.
= ನಾರುಬಟ್ಟೆ.
the type of white, fibre-like looking, cloud, found at high altitudes; cirrus.
the plant Gloriosa superba of Liliaceae family.
the grass Schizachyrium exile of Poaceae family, with stiff, slender stem growing upto 3-4 feet.
a kind of skin disease caused by the worm guinea worm (Dracunculus medinensis), which lives as a parasite in the subcutaneous tissues of human and other mammals.
(Buddh. Phil.) the condition of not being formless.
to take out long yarn or thread as from cotton, wool, silk, etc.
to cut away or strip off the bark of a tree, etc.
the tree Ochna squarrosa of Ochnceae family.
= ನಾರ್ಗಾಮುಂಡುಗೆಯ್.
a short, catchy saying, usu. of unknown origin, that expresses effectively some commonplace truth or useful thought; an adage; a saw; a proverb.
a widely talked about subject.
the chief of a region or district.
the office, authority or duty of the chief of a region or district.
to rule or administer as the chief of a district or region.
= ನಾರ್ಗಾಮುಂಡ.
= ನಾರ್ಗಾಮುಂಡುಗೆಯ್.
= ನಾರಾಯಣ.
that which is useless.
the quality or condition of being so.
a retiring or being retired from work, business, profession, etc.; retirement.
(in comp.) four.
made or consisting of reeds.
the hollow stalk of some plants as lotus.
any hollow tube of metal, glass, rubber, etc.
any of the tube-like structures in the body as windpipe, oesophagus, etc.
that part of a tool, utensil, etc meant to be held by hand while being used; a handle.
a narrow, long bed bound on both sides by embankment, made for water to run through; a channel.
arsenic trisulfide, As2S3 , having a lemon-yellow colour and a resinous lustre which is used as a pigment; yellow orpiment.
a long, flat shaft used as a lever to propel a boat; an oar.
a metal plate nailed to the hooves of oxen, horses, etc. for protection; a shoe.
a payment made or to be made by the players of the game of chance to the person who runs the club.
to nail metal shoes to the hooves of oxen, horses, etc.
to nail small metal plates to the sole of a footwear.
a kind of palankeen (a covered litter carried by poles on the shoulders of two or four men) used by men of rank.
a man whose profession is to shoe the horses, oxen, etc.
the movable, muscular structure in the mouth in most vertebrates used for ingestion of food, perception of taste, and in humans for the articulation of speech sounds; the tongue.
an analogous part in invertebrate animals.
the burning gas or vapour of fire, stretching out and flickering with various colours; flame.
a spoken word or words; speech.
the metal part hung inside a bell which, when strikes the cup of the bell, produces a metallic sound; a clapper.

ನಾಲಗೆ ಉದ್ದ ಬಿಡು nālage udda biḍu to talk contemptuously, going beyond one's status, position or the limits of propriety; ನಾಲಗೆ ಉದ್ದ ಮಾಡು nālage udda māḍu = ನಾಲಗೆ ಉದ್ದ ಬಿಡು; ನಾಲಗೆಗೆ ಬರು nālageg baru (as a thought, saying, etc.) about or almost to be said; to be on the tip of the tongue; ನಾಲಗೆ ತಪ್ಪು nālage tappu to break one's own promise; ನಾಲಗೆ ನಿಡಿದಾಗು nālage niḍidāgu (one's tendency of speaking) to cross the limits of propriety; ನಾಲಗೆಯ ತಿಂಡಿ nālageya tinḍi = ನಾಲಗೆತೀಟೆ; ನಾಲಗೆಯ ವೀರ nālageya vīra = ನಾಲಗೆಗಲಿ; ನಾಲಗೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ನಲಿದಾಡು nālageya mēle nalidāḍu (knowledge of something or the power of speaking impressively) to be at the command of a person; ನಾಲಗೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಮಚ್ಚೆಯಿರು nālageya mēle macce iru (the power for foretelling) to be with a person (whose foretelling proves to be correct); ನಾಲಗೆಯಾಡಿಸು nālageyāḍisu (fig.) to speak; 2. to munch something; ನಾಲಗೆಯಾಡು nālageyāḍu to munch something; 2. (one's capacity to talk) to be active (usu. used in negative sense); 3. to wet one's lips with the tip of the tongue; ನಾಲಗೆ ಹರಿಬಿಡು nālage haribiḍu to talk without restraint or propriety.
to bite one's tongue regretting one's speech.
a stone piece, in a wall of a building or well, stretching out.
(one's ability of perceiving and discerning taste) to fail.
one who talks about action but fails in carrying out his words.
a man who has the tendency of talking lightly or without propriety.
the quality or tendency of talking lightly or without propriety.
